amendment.description: An amendment numbered 62 printed in Part F of House Report 118-216 to restore funding for the Commodity Futures Trading Commision (CFTC) to FY18 spending levels.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Donalds amendment (A016) Agreed to by voice vote.
